Explore Ireland Coach Tour | Innovative Travel | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Explore Ireland Coach Tour 12 days | Dublin roundtrip Embark on an unforgettable journey through the stunning landscapes and rich history of Ireland. This comprehensive tour offers a perfect blend of iconic landmarks, hidden gems, and authentic Irish experiences. You'll marvel at breathtaking coastal views and picturesque landscapes as you travel along the Causeway Coast and the Ring of Kerry. Explore vibrant cities such as Dublin and Belfast, as well as charming towns like Kilkenny and Derry. Delve into Ireland's rich heritage with visits to historic sites such as The Burren and the medieval city of Kilkenny. Discover the art of whiskey making at The Midleton Distillery Experience and learn about the history of glass making in Waterford. With expert guides, comfortable accommodations, and carefully crafted itineraries, this tour promises an immersive and unforgettable experience in the Emerald Isle. Deal Details Travel Dates 19 May, 09Jun, 14 Jul, 25 Aug, 08 Sep, 06 Oct 2026 Priced From $6,826 per person Enquire Now Embark on an unforgettable journey through the stunning landscapes and rich history of Ireland. This comprehensive tour offers a perfect blend of iconic landmarks, hidden gems, and authentic Irish experiences. You'll marvel at breathtaking coastal views and picturesque landscapes as you travel along the Causeway Coast and the Ring of Kerry. Explore vibrant cities such as Dublin and Belfast, as well as charming towns like Kilkenny and Derry. Delve into Ireland's rich heritage with visits to historic sites such as The Burren and the medieval city of Kilkenny. Discover the art of whiskey making at The Midleton Distillery Experience and learn about the history of glass making in Waterford. With expert guides, comfortable accommodations, and carefully crafted itineraries, this tour promises an immersive and unforgettable experience in the Emerald Isle. Pricing First Class From $6,826* per person twin share From $8,997* Single room Itinerary Day 1 Dublin Day 2 Dublin to Belfast Day 3 Belfast City Day 4 Giant's Causeway and Derry Day 5 Donegal to Galway Day 6 Burren and Cliffs of Moher Day 7 Galway to Cork Day 8 Kerry Highlights Day 9 Midleton and Waterford Day 10 Kilkenny and Dunbrody Day 11 Kilkenny to Dublin Day 12 Dublin Inclusions Modern Motor Coach with driver from Day 2 to Day 11 English speaking guide included throughout 11 nights accommodation in first class hotels Breakfast Daily Dinner at your hotel on Day 4 and Day 5 Sightseeing as per itinerary. Visits include: The Glyde Inn VR Experience, Hillsborough Castle, Titanic Belfast, Giants Causeway, Derry City Walking Tour, Belleek Pottery, Marble Arch Caves, Cliffs of Moher, Blarney Castle, Jaunting Car ride in Killarney National Park, Midleton Distillery Experience, House of Waterford, Dunbrody Famine Ship, EPIC Museum Entrance Fees Porterage x1 piece of luggage per person in/out hotels Exclusions International and/or Domestic Air Fares Optional tours and excursions Sightseeing/Meals not stated in Itinerary Hotel charges for minibar or any extra charges Porterage Early check in/late check out unless specified Travel Insurance - compulsory Tipping/Gratuities (please refer to tour notes for a recommended guideline) Personal Expenses Departure taxes Visas (unless specified) Fuel surcharges/Major currency fluctuations Any other services not clearly mentioned in the inclusions above Terms & Conditions Trip prices and dates are correct at the time of the website going live, however all offers are subject to reconfirmation at the time of booking. All featured tour itineraries and offers maybe subject to change due to seasonal variations without notice, or due to local conditions or other conditions. Please confirm all details at time of booking. Travel insurance is mandatory for all Innovative Travel bookings. All passports must be valid for 6 months prior to your return to your home country. Visas are the responsibility of the traveller. Special VIP meet and assist offers are valid for New Zealand passport holders, for other nationalities please check at the time of booking. For full terms and conditions, please contact your World Travellers consultant. Professional Service Fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
